Description.Name: Highway to the Danger Zone!
Description.Details: A knock sounds on your office door and you call out, "Come in..." The door opens and Darius strides in with a datapad, "Commander, the aptitude tests for candidates to attend Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLAM],LAM]] piloting school have come back. There is one pilot who has completed the assessment and should meet the requirements: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] You just need to select the pilot you wish to attend and sign the form on the screen and I'll take it from there."

Description.Name: All Systems Go
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Darius as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] packed up and on the next jumpship bound for the LAMcademy. Darius jumps up and heads off to the barracks to inform [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] they have been accepted into Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy.

Description.Name: Abort! Abort!
Description.Details: You look over the name and record of the candidate. You thumb back through their file numerous times, before letting out a long sigh and close the datapad. You hand the pad back to Darius, "Thanks Darius, but I do not think that pilot meets our needs here. See if there are any other suitable candidates. We do not need to rush into this blindly." Darius takes the datapad, "As you wish, Commander. Wham-Ba-LAM will still bill us the cost of the assessment. The LAMcademy also states the applicant must wait 90 days before they can reapply should you change your mind later." The following pilot is not eligible again for 90 days: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]
